markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Jar of Shifting Sands](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1064)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Earth" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=55" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 186 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This small, ceramic jar is full, holding approximately a quarter gallon of sand. When poured out, the jar immediately begins to conjure more sand. It is said, however improbably, that this jar is responsible for creating at least one desert in the world.

<document level="2" id="action-853" />

<document level="2" id="action-854" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Jar of Shifting Sands
